code: import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;export const fetchFacts=async(topic,dateRange,reputable)=>{try{const response=await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/facts`,{params:{topic:topic,date_range:dateRange,reputable:reputable}});return response.data;}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching facts:",error);throw error;}};
